remarks: A measurable function is integrable iff its absolute value is integrable.  (See ~ iblabs for the forward implication.)  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 25-Aug-2014.)
statement:
iblabsr.1 $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. A ) -> B e. V ) $.
iblabsr.2 $e |- ( ph -> ( x e. A |-> B ) e. MblFn ) $.
iblabsr.3 $e |- ( ph -> ( x e. A |-> ( abs ` B ) ) e. L^1 ) $.
iblabsr $p |- ( ph -> ( x e. A |-> B ) e. L^1 ) $.
$d A x $.
$d V x $.
$d ph x $.
